Uses of Class
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor.MessagePattern

Packages that use MessagePattern 
Package Description
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.actor
Provides classes and interfaces defining the components that must be used, extended or implemented for the development of new kinds of actors.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.buffer
Shows how actors can implement the classical bounded buffer example through an implementation based on behavior change and one based on state change.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.examples.unreliability
Shows how to use future messages with timeouts for managing unreliable communication between actors.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.executor
Provides classes implementing the different behaviors that can be used for managing the execution of the other actors (excluding the other special actor, i.e., the service provider) of the actor space.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.filtering
Provides classes and interfaces defining patterns and matchers and some useful implementations used for filtering objects.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.service
Provides classes defining the services that can be provided by an actor space service provider.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.service.logging
Provides classes defining the components of the logging service.
it.unipr.sowide.actodes.service.logging.content
Provides classes defining the message contents used for notifying the logging events.

    static MessagePattern Behavior.ACCEPTALL
    Message pattern that accepts any message.

    Message pattern matching a cycle message received from the scheduling actor.

    Message pattern for matching a kill message.
    static MessagePattern Behavior.START
    Message pattern for matching the starting behavior message.
    static MessagePattern Behavior.TIMEOUT
